column1: Experts are warning that the United States is ill prepared for a coming mental health crisis caused by the coronavirus pandemic, which has killed more than 100,000 people in the nation and caused millions to lose their jobs. #TrumpResignNow

Now a troll -YouTuber it's telling everyone it's okay you can wear lace gloves or even cotton gloves and you can just put a scarf around your face and you'll be safe from coronavirus...... Republicans are trying to get people sick..... Trump is holding rallies.... So stupid!!!!
